Name: OrganizationSchemeName
Description: A name for the OrganizationScheme. May be expressed in multiple languages. Repeat the element to express names with different content, for example different names for different systems.

Name: Label
Description: A display label for the OrganizationScheme. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content. Repeat for labels with different content, for example, labels with differing length limitations.

Name: Description
Description: A description of the content and purpose of the OrganizationScheme. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content.

Name: OrganizationSchemeReference
Description: Reference to an existing OrganizationScheme for inclusion by reference.

Name: OrganizationReference
Description: In-line description of an Organization. These may be referenced by many elements in DDI and provide fuller detail regarding the Organization.

Name: IndividualReference
Description: In-line description of an Individual. These may be referenced by many elements in DDI and provide fuller detail regarding the Individual.

Name: RelationReference
Description: In-line description of a Relationship between two organizations or individual or between an individual and an organization. Relation is generally and on-going association not associated with a specific role in relationship to a study.

Name: OrganizationGroupReference
Description: In-line description of a group of Organizations, Individuals, and/or Relations.
